text: jab (hazrath) Moosa (alaihissalaam) ne apni khaum se kaha ke aye meri khaum! bachde ko maboodh bana kar tumne apni jaano par zulm kiya hai, ab tum apne paida karne waale ki taraf rujo karo, apne ko aapas mein qatal karo, tumhaari behteri Allah taâ€™ala ke nazdeek isi mein hai, to us ne tumhaari tauba qubool ki,wo tauba qubool karne waala aur rahem wa karam karne waala hai
